alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Fulton; Marion; Searcy (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 8:59AM CDT until April 05 at 9:45AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Searcy County in north central Arkansas... Marion County in north central Arkansas... Western Fulton County in north central Arkansas... Baxter County in north central Arkansas... * Until 945 AM CDT. * At 858 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Maumee, or 8 miles south of Yellville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mountain Home... Bull Shoals... Yellville... Gassville... Flippin... Lakeview in Baxter County... Norfork... Salesville... Briarcliff... Pyatt... Arkawana... Bull Shoals State Park... Herron... Colfax... Maumee... Rodney... Advance... Cartney... Culp... Norfork Dam... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon CDT for north central Arkansas. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 400 PM CDT for north central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon CDT for north central Arkansas. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 400 PM CDT for north central Arkansas.
